flixel.effects.FlxFlicker

type
class
The retro flickering effect with callbacks. You can use this as a mixin in any FlxObject subclass or by calling the static functions.

Static Methods

flicker(Object : flixel.FlxObject, ?Duration : Float, ?Interval : Float, ?EndVisibility : Bool, ?ForceRestart : Bool, ?CompletionCallback : FlxFlicker -> Void, ?ProgressCallback : FlxFlicker -> Void) : Void

parameters
Object The sprite.
Duration How long to flicker for.
Interval In what interval to toggle visibility. Set to FlxG.elapsed if <= 0!
EndVisibility Force the visible value when the flicker completes, useful with fast repetitive use.
ForceRestart Force the flicker to restart from beginnig, discarding the flickering effect already in progress if there is one.
?CompletionCallback An optional callback that will be triggered when a flickering has finished.
?ProgressCallback An optional callback that will be triggered when visibility is toggled.
A simple flicker effect for sprites using a ping-pong tween by toggling visibility.

isFlickering(Object : flixel.FlxObject) : Bool

parameters
Object The object to test.
Returns whether the object is flickering or not.

stopFlickering(Object : flixel.FlxObject) : Void

parameters
Object The object to stop flickering.
Stops flickering of the object. Also it will make the object visible.

Constructor

new()
Internal constructor. Just use static methods.

Instance Variables

duration(default,null) : Float

The duration of the flicker.

endVisibility(default,null) : Bool

The final visibility of the object after flicker is complete.

interval(default,null) : Float

The interval of the flicker.

object(default,null) : flixel.FlxObject

The flickering object.

timer(default,null) : flixel.util.FlxTimer

The flicker timer. You can check how many seconds has passed since flickering started etc.

Instance Methods

completionCallback(FlxFlicker) : Void

The callback that will be triggered after flicker has completed.

destroy() : Void

Nullifies the references to prepare object for reuse and avoid memory leaks.

progressCallback(FlxFlicker) : Void

The callback that will be triggered every time object visiblity is changed.
